content: तारण, तारित, तारिक &c. See under तॄ.

तारण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [तारयत्यनेन तॄ-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Enabling to cross. {@--2@} Saving, delivering, liberating. {@--3@} Helping one through a difficulty &c. --णः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva; also of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} A boat, raft. --णं {@--1@} Crossing. {@--2@} Conquering. {@--3@} Carrying or conveying across. {@--4@} Rescuing, delivering, liberating.
